meanings.sent1: The precleaned dishes sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She always preferred to buy precleaned vegetables for convenience.
meanings.sent3: The precleaned car was so shiny, it looked brand new!
meanings.sent4: Her precleaned room felt like a fresh start every morning.
meanings.sent5: The precleaned windows made the whole house brighter.

meanings.sent1: The precleaned clothes smelled fresh and ready to wear.
